statements: SELECT * FROM cost_savings_reports
SELECT id, report_date, savings_amount FROM cost_savings_reports ORDER BY report_date DESC
SELECT initiative_name, department FROM cost_savings_reports WHERE savings_amount > 5000
SELECT id, initiative_name, department FROM cost_savings_reports WHERE department = 'Marketing'
SELECT * FROM cost_savings_reports WHERE report_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31'
SELECT * FROM cost_savings_reports WHERE initiative_name = 'Cost Reduction Initiative' ORDER BY savings_amount DESC;
SELECT id, initiative_name, department FROM cost_savings_reports WHERE report_date > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY report_date ASC;
SELECT department, SUM(savings_amount) AS total_savings FROM cost_savings_reports GROUP BY department;
SELECT initiative_name, AVG(savings_amount) AS avg_savings FROM cost_savings_reports GROUP BY initiative_name HAVING avg_savings > 5000;
SELECT report_date, initiative_name, department FROM cost_savings_reports WHERE department IN ('Finance', 'Operations') ORDER BY report_date DESC, savings_amount ASC;
SELECT * FROM cost_savings_reports;
SELECT report_name, achieved_by FROM cost_savings_reports;
SELECT report_id, savings_amount FROM cost_savings_reports ORDER BY savings_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM cost_savings_reports WHERE achieved_by = 'Automation';
SELECT report_name, savings_amount FROM cost_savings_reports WHERE savings_amount > 5000;
SELECT * FROM cost_savings_reports WHERE savings_amount > 5000 ORDER BY report_name DESC;
SELECT report_name, achieved_by, savings_amount FROM cost_savings_reports WHERE achieved_by LIKE '%John%';
SELECT report_id, report_name, savings_amount, achieved_by FROM cost_savings_reports WHERE savings_amount BETWEEN 2000 AND 8000 ORDER BY savings_amount DESC;
SELECT report_name, CONCAT('Achieved by: ', achieved_by) AS description FROM cost_savings_reports WHERE LENGTH(report_name) < 10;
SELECT * FROM cost_savings_reports WHERE report_name LIKE 'Quarterly%' ORDER BY report_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM CostSavingsReports;
SELECT report_name, savings_amount FROM CostSavingsReports WHERE savings_amount > 5000;
SELECT report_date, report_name FROM CostSavingsReports ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT report_id, report_date, savings_amount FROM CostSavingsReports WHERE report_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM SourcingInitiatives WHERE start_date < '2022-05-01';
SELECT * FROM CostSavingsReports WHERE savings_amount > 5000
SELECT report_name, report_date FROM CostSavingsReports ORDER BY report_date DESC
SELECT initiative_name, MAX(total_savings) AS max_savings FROM InitiativeReports GROUP BY initiative_name
SELECT * FROM SourcingInitiatives WHERE start_date < '2021-01-01' AND end_date > '2021-12-31'

SELECT initiative_name, report_date, total_savings FROM InitiativeReports INNER JOIN SourcingInitiatives ON InitiativeReports.initiative_id = SourcingInitiatives.initiative_id WHERE total_savings > 10000 ORDER BY report_date ASC
SELECT * FROM cost_savings_reports;
SELECT * FROM sourcing_projects ORDER BY project_name ASC;
SELECT project_id, savings_amount FROM cost_savings_reports WHERE savings_amount > 1000;
SELECT vendor_name, order_amount FROM procurement_orders WHERE vendor_name = 'ABC Company';
SELECT vendor_name, savings_date FROM cost_savings_reports WHERE vendor_name LIKE '%Tech%';
SELECT * FROM cost_savings_reports ORDER BY savings_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT project_name, department FROM sourcing_projects WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT vendor_name, SUM(order_amount) AS total_amount FROM procurement_orders GROUP BY vendor_name ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT vendor_name, contact_person, email FROM vendor_details WHERE vendor_name LIKE '%Tech%' AND email IS NOT NULL;

SELECT report_id, project_id, savings_amount, savings_date FROM cost_savings_reports JOIN sourcing_projects ON cost_savings_reports.project_id = sourcing_projects.project_id WHERE savings_amount > 5000;
SELECT id, initiative_name, savings_amount, report_date FROM cost_savings_report;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_person, contact_email FROM suppliers;
SELECT project_id, project_name, start_date, end_date FROM procurement_projects;
SELECT expense_type, expense_amount, expense_date FROM expenses;
SELECT initiative_name, initiative_description, start_date, end_date FROM sourcing_initiatives;
SELECT * FROM cost_savings_report ORDER BY savings_amount DESC, report_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT initiative_name, savings_amount FROM cost_savings_report WHERE savings_amount > 5000 ORDER BY savings_amount DESC;
SELECT initiative_name, report_date FROM cost_savings_report WHERE report_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY report_date ASC;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_email FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_address LIKE '%Street%' ORDER BY supplier_name ASC;

SELECT project_name, expense_type, expense_amount FROM procurement_projects JOIN expenses ON procurement_projects.project_id = expenses.project_id WHERE expenses.expense_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY expense_amount DESC LIMIT 5;
